subject: Soccer
Coaches and Managers
organizations: New York City Football Club (Soccer Team)
lead_paragraph: New York City F.C., which will begin Major League Soccer play in 2015, announced that it had hired Jason Kreis as the club’s first coach.
snippet: New York City F.C., which will begin Major League Soccer play in 2015, announced that it had hired Jason Kreis as the club’s first coach.
